original_text: I will direct my jealous anger against you, and they will deal with you in fury. They will cut off your noses and your ears, and those of you who are left will fall by the sword. They will take away your sons and daughters, and those of you who are left will be consumed by fire.
korean_text: 내가 너를 향하여 질투하리니 그들이 분내어 네 코와 귀를 깎아 버리고 남은 자를 칼로 엎드러뜨리며 네 자녀를 빼앗고 그 남은 자를 불에 사르며

sentences.original_text: I will direct my jealous anger against you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 질투하는 분노를 너를 향해 쏟을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and they will deal with you in fury
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 분노로 너를 대할 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will cut off your noses and your ears
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너의 코와 귀를 잘라낼 것이다

sentences.original_text: and those of you who are left
They will take away your sons and daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너의 아들들과 딸들을 데려갈 것이다

sentences.original_text: and those of you who are left
